thread.title: Gail Whittenberger
thread.title_full: PlantShed New York Flowers reviewed by Gail Whittenberger

author: Gail Whittenberger
title: Gail Whittenberger
text: I searched to find something different for my daughter in law. I found that I could purchase individual stems. She just loved them. Very high quality. She filled 2 big vases with hydrangeas and star gazers. Also the delivery was right on time.
